Resource Documents/tessin-georg-verbande-und-truppen-der-deutschen-wehrmacht-und-waffen-ss/Tessin, Georg - Verbände und Truppen der deutschen Wehrmacht und Waffen-SS - Band 01_hocr_searchtext.txt.gz
data_requirements: Aircraft types and quantities per unit
Base locations in North Africa (Libya, Cyrenaica)

prompt_context:
You are a military historian extracting Luftwaffe aircraft data from the Tessin Wehrmacht Encyclopedia.

Task: Extract ALL factual information about German Luftwaffe air force units operating in North Africa during Q2 1941 (April-June 1941).

Focus on:
- Fliegerführer Afrika (overall air command)
- Fighter units (Jagdgeschwader, especially JG 27)
- Dive bomber units (Stukageschwader, especially StG 3)
- Bomber units (Kampfgeschwader)
- Twin-engine fighter units (Zerstörergeschwader, especially ZG 26)

For each fact extracted, provide:
1. The fact itself (in English)
2. Source citation (volume, page number, section)
3. Confidence level (0-100)
4. Category (organization|aircraft|personnel|equipment|command)
5. Original German text (if relevant)

Output format: JSON array of facts with structure:
[
  {
    "fact": "string",
    "source_citation": "Tessin Band 15, page X, section Y",
    "confidence": 95,
    "category": "aircraft",
    "original_text": "German text from source",
    "notes": "any additional context"
  }
]

Important: This is a Tier 1 primary source (95% confidence baseline). Preserve original German unit designations and terminology.
